body:
Hello everyone.

For the past three days, I have voted but not received an emerald which gives me the 30 experience points.

I was just wondering if this was a glitch, if there are no voting rewards anymore, or what is happening with it?

Also, I am wondering if anyone else is experiencing this same problem.

Thank you,
-MLGPorky.

title: Voting Glitch?
